thread.title: Monterey statue of Junipero Serra decapitated
thread.title_full: Monterey statue of Junipero Serra decapitated - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joaquin Palomino
title: Monterey statue of Junipero Serra decapitated
text:
Photo: Marcio Jose Sanchez, Associated Press An interview is conducted next to a statue of Junipero Serra at the Carmel Mission, Wednesday, Sept. 23, 2015, in Carmel-By-The-Sea, Calif. Serra, an 18th-century missionary who brought Catholicism to the American West Coast, was elevated to sainthood Wednesday by Pope Francis in the first canonization on U.S. soil. An interview is conducted next to a statue of Junipero Serra at the...
Police are searching for vandals that decapitated a statue of Junipero Serra at the Monterey Presidio earlier this week, becoming the second in a string of incidents targeting structures memorializing the recently canonized — and controversial — religious figure. Serra, an 18th-century missionary who brought Catholicism to the American West Coast, was elevated to sainthood Wednesday by Pope Francis in the first canonization on U.S. soil. An interview is conducted next to a statue of Junipero Serra at the...
Police are searching for vandals that decapitated a statue of Junipero Serra at the Monterey Presidio earlier this week, becoming the second in a string of incidents targeting structures memorializing the recently canonized — and controversial — religious figure.
